long_description: The North Face Trappist pack is designed to keep up with your active lifestyle with purpose-built pockets for your skateboard, bike lock and electronics. The large main compartment with organizational features fits a 17 in. laptop in the protective laptop sleeve, and a tablet in the adjacent neoprene tablet sleeve. 2 upper exterior pockets house your cell phone and feature silicone-backed webbed straps to secure USB flash drives. The daisy chain on the front of the pack holds a U-lock during your bike commute. An adjustable compression strap at the center of the pack holds your skate deck and loops at the bottom secure the wheels. A hidden pocket in the lower back panel stashes your wallet for safekeeping while still keeping it accessible. The North Face Trappist pack is constructed with waterproof zips and crafted of durable twill fabric with a waterproof coating to keep your gear dry during your daily commute.
short_description: The North Face Trappist pack is designed to keep up with your active lifestyle with purpose-built pockets for your skateboard, bike lock and electronics.
